name: Dead Tree by a Stream at the Foot of a Hill
description: Dead Tree by a Stream at the Foot of a Hill; Jacob van Ruisdael (Dutch, 1628/1629 - 1682); about 1650 - 1660; Black chalk, point of brush and light and dark gray washes; 14.4 x 18.9 cm (5 11/16 x 7 7/16 in.); 85.GG.410; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Dead Tree by a Stream at the Foot of a Hill
medium: Black chalk, point of brush and light and dark gray washes
